Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create an administrator context called "InheritedAdminContext" with "AdminContext" as parent context and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Category creation
Right click on the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer and select "New" -> "Category" in the contextual menu
Right click on the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer and select "New" -> "Category" in the contextual menu
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Two categories "Category0" and "Category1" have been added to the "AdminContext" context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click on the "InheritedAdminContext" and select "Synchronize"
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "InheritedAdminContext" context contains two categories "Category0" and "Category1"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Category renaming
In the "AdminContext" context, right click on the "Category0" category and select "Edit" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An "Edit category" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill the "Name:" textfield with value "NewCategory"
Click on the "Finish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit category" dialog box disappears. The "Category0" variable has been renamed to "NewCategory" in the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click on the "InheritedAdminContext" and select "Synchronize"
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Participation to AdminContext" context contains two categories "NewCategory" and "Category1"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Category moving
In the "AdminContext" context, right click on the "Category1" category in the context viewer and select "Cut" in the contextual menu
Right click on the "NewCategory" category in the context viewer and select "Paste" in the contextual menu
Click on the "NewCategory" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: "Category1" is now a sub-category of the "NewCategory" category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click on the "InheritedAdminContext" and select "Synchronize"
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "InheritedAdminContext" context contains one category "NewCategory"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "NewCategory" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: "Category1" is a sub-category of the "NewCategory" category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Variable creation
In the "AdminContext" context, right click on the "NewCategory" category in the context viewer and select "New" -> "Variable" in the contextual menu
Right click on the "NewCategory" category in the context viewer and select "New" -> "FileVariable" in the contextual menu
Right click on the "NewCategory" category in the context viewer and select "New" -> "FolderVariable" in the contextual menu
Click on the "NewCategory" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Three variable have been added to category "NewCategory" in the variable viewer: "Variable0", "FileVariable0" and "FolderVariable0"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click on the "InheritedAdminContext" and select "Synchronize"
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "InheritedAdminContext" context contains one category "NewCategory"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "NewCategory" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "NewCategory" category contains three variables: "Variable0", "FileVariable0" and "FolderVariable0"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Variable modification
In the "AdminContext" context, click on the "NewCategory" category
In the variable viewer, right click on the "Variable0" and select "Edit"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An "Edit variable" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill "Unique value" textfield with "NewValue"
Click on the "Finish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit variable" dialog box disappears. The value of the "Variable0" variable changed to "NewValue"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click on the "InheritedAdminContext" and select "Synchronize"
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "NewCategory" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "NewCategory" category contains three variables: "Variable0", "FileVariable0" and "FolderVariable0". The value of the "Variable0" variable is "NewValue"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Variable renaming
In the "AdminContext" context, click on the "NewCategory" category
In the variable viewer, right click on the "FileVariable0" and select "Edit"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An "Edit variable" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill the "Name:" textfield with value "RenamedFileVariable"
Click on the "Finish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit variable" dialog box disappears. The "FileVariable0" variable has been renamed to "RenamedFileVariable" in the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click on the "InheritedAdminContext" and select "Synchronize"
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "NewCategory" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "NewCategory" category contains three variables: "Variable0", "RenamedFileVariable" and "FolderVariable0"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Variable moving
In the "AdminContext" context, click on the "NewCategory" category
In the variable viewer, right click on the "FolderVariable0" and select "Cut"
Right click on the "Orchestra" category and select "Paste" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "FolderVariable0" variable has been added to the "Orchestra" category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "NewCategory" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "NewCategory" category contains two variables: "Variable0", "RenamedFileVariable"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click on the "InheritedAdminContext" and select "Synchronize"
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "NewCategory" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "NewCategory" category contains two variables: "Variable0", "RenamedFileVariable"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Orchestra" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "FolderVariable0" variable has been added to the "Orchestra" category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Variable removal
In the "AdminContext" context, click on the "NewCategory" category
In the variable viewer, right click on the "Variable0" variable and select "Delete"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Delete" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Yes" button to confirm deletion

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Delete" dialog box disappears. The "Variable0" variable has been removed from the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click on the "InheritedAdminContext" and select "Synchronize"
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "NewCategory" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "NewCategory" category contains a single variable: "RenamedFileVariable"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create an administrator context called "AdminContext2" with "AdminContext" as parent context and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create an administrator context called "AdminContext3" with "AdminContext2" as parent context and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
In the "AdminContext" context, right click on the 'Orchestra' category in the context viewer and select "New" -> "Variable" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Variable0' has been added to the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the variable viewer, right click on the "Variable0" and select "Edit"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An "Edit variable" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill the "Name:" textfield with value "VariableAdminContext"
Click on the "Finish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit variable" dialog box disappears. The "Variable0" variable has been renamed to "VariableAdminContext" in the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the "AdminContext2" context, right click on the 'Orchestra' category in the context viewer and select "New" -> "Variable" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Variable0' has been added to the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill the "Name:" textfield with value "VariableAdminContext2"
Click on the "Finish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit variable" dialog box disappears. The "Variable0" variable has been renamed to "VariableAdminContext2" in the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Right click in the context viewer and select 'Synchronize all contexts' in the contextual menu
Unfold the " AdminContext2" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'VariableAdminContext' variable has been added to the Orchestra category from the 'AdminContext' context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the " AdminContext3" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'VariableAdminContext' variable has been added to the Orchestra category from the 'AdminContext' context, and a 'VariableAdminContext2' has been added from the 'AdminContext2' context

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Synchronise all contexts at one through the Java API

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Test preparation
Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create an administrator context called "AdminContext2" with "AdminContext" as parent context and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create an administrator context called "AdminContext3" with "AdminContext2" as parent context and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
In the "AdminContext" context, right click on the 'Orchestra' category in the context viewer and select "New" -> "Variable" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Variable0' has been added to the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the variable viewer, right click on the "Variable0" and select "Edit"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An "Edit variable" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill the "Name:" textfield with value "VariableAdminContext"
Click on the "Finish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit variable" dialog box disappears. The "Variable0" variable has been renamed to "VariableAdminContext" in the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the "AdminContext2" context, right click on the 'Orchestra' category in the context viewer and select "New" -> "Variable" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Variable0' has been added to the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the variable viewer, right click on the "Variable0" and select "Edit"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An "Edit variable" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill the "Name:" textfield with value "VariableAdminContext2"
Click on the "Finish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit variable" dialog box disappears. The "Variable0" variable has been renamed to "VariableAdminContext2" in the variable viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
Eclipse Project
Open the Eclipse EDI and import the "SynchronizeAllTest" project located in the "Data_Used_For_The_Test" directory

Properly set dependencies on: com.google.gdata.core com.thalesgroup.orchestra.framework.lib com.thalesgroup.orchestra.framework.lib.base com.thalesgroup.orchestra.framework.puci jetty-client org.eclipse.core.runtime org.eclipse.emf.common org.eclipse.equinox.common org.eclipse.jetty.http org.eclipse.jetty.util org.eclipse.jetty.io org.eclipse.osgi
Execute SynchronizeAllTest.java as Java application
Results in the Orchestra Framework
Within the Orchestra Framework, unfold the " AdminContext2" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'VariableAdminContext' variable has been added to the Orchestra category from the 'AdminContext' context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the " AdminContext3" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'VariableAdminContext' variable has been added to the Orchestra category from the 'AdminContext' context, and a 'VariableAdminContext2' has been added from the 'AdminContext2' context
